member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.To(System.String,System.String,Lurgle.Alerting.AddressType)
member.summary:
Add a single recipient email address to the alert. You can chain this multiple times.
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email.
You can optionally supply key names to retrieve email addresses from the app config.
member.param: Email address to send the email to. Comma- and semicolon-delimited lists can be parsed, but toName will then be ignored.
Display name of the recipient. Will be ignored if a comma- or semicolon-delimited toAddress is passed
Type of email address - defaults to but accepts to read from config

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.To(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary:
Add an array of email addresses to the recipient field for the alert.
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email
member.param: List of email addresses in array form

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.To(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary:
Add a list of paired email address and name values to the recipient field for the alert.
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email
member.param: List of email addresses and display names as a Dictionary of Key = string, Value = string

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.Cc(System.String,System.String,Lurgle.Alerting.AddressType)
member.summary:
Add a single CC address to the alert. You can chain this multiple times.
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email.
member.param: Email address to send the email to. Comma- and semicolon-delimited lists can be parsed, but toName will then be ignored.
Display name of the recipient. Will be ignored if a comma- or semicolon-delimited toAddress is passed
Type of email address - defaults to but accepts to read from config

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.Cc(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary:
Add an array of email addresses to the CC field for the alert
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email
member.param: List of email addresses in array form

member.summary:
Add an array of email addresses to the BCC field for this alert
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email
member.param: List of email addresses in array form

member.summary:
Set the Reply To address for the alert.
If no address is specified, value will be used.
member.param: Email address to send replies to.

member.summary:
Set the subject for the alert email.
Passing an empty subjectText will use the .
member.param: Subject to use for the email
Optional arguments for string replacement"

member.summary:
Set the Priority for the alert email.
Emails default to
member.param: The priority that this email should be sent with

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.SetHtml(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the current email to HTML if true (default). Shouldn't be needed any more since we have HTML and alternate text implementations.

member.summary: Add the Alt view for the HTML contents. Shouldn't be needed any more since we have HTML and alternate text implementations.
member.param: Message body as string
List of linked resources

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.Attach(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Attach a file to the alert. You can chain this multiple times.
If the file does not exist, it will be ignored
member.param: Path to the file
ContentType, if known (optional)

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.Attach(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary:
Attach an array of files to the alert
If any file does not exist, it will be ignored
member.param: Array of paths to files that will be attached

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.Attach(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Attach a file opened as a stream to the alert

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.AttachInline(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary:
Attach an array of files to the alert as inline attachments
If any file does not exist, it will be ignored
member.param: Array of paths to files that will be attached
Path to folder containing files

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.Send(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Send the alert with the specified message text - assumes plain text You can optionally pass a string containing format items, and the replacement objects, and a string.format will be applied.
member.param: Body of the email. Can contain format items for string replacement.
Optional arguments for string replacement

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.Get(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Return a rendered alert email with the specified message text - assumes plain text You can optionally pass a string containing format items, and the replacement objects, and a string.format will be applied.
member.param: Body of the email. Can contain format items for string replacement.
Optional arguments for string replacement

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.SendHtml(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Send the alert with the specified message text and alternate body You can optionally pass a string containing format items, and the replacement objects, and a string.format will be applied.
member.param: Body of the email. Can contain format items for string replacement.
Alternate text body. Can contain format items for string replacement.
Optional arguments for string replacement

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.GetHtml(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Return a rendered alert email with the specified message text and alternate body You can optionally pass a string containing format items, and the replacement objects, and a string.format will be applied.
member.param: Body of the email. Can contain format items for string replacement.
Alternate text body. Can contain format items for string replacement.
Optional arguments for string replacement

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.SendTemplateFile``1(System.String,``0,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Send the alert using the selected template file and model
This does not check for the file existence, so a non-existent config item or missing file will cause an exception that can be caught.
member.param: Config item to load for the selected template file
The Model to apply to this template
Render the text version of your template as an alternate text

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.GetTemplateFile``1(System.String,``0,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Return a rendered alert email using the selected template file and model

member.param: Config item to load for the selected template file
The Model to apply to this template
Render the text version of your template as an alternate text

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.SendTemplateFileAsync``1(System.String,``0,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Send the alert using the selected template (as configured in the application config) and model
This does not check for the file existence, so a non-existent config item or missing file will cause an exception that can be caught.
member.param: Config item to load for the selected template file
The Model to apply to this template
Render the text version of your template as an alternate text

member.summary:
Instantiate a new email with the desired From address.
Uses if an email is not specified.
member.param: Email address to send the email from
Display name of the sender
Type of email address - defaults to but accepts to read from config
Add the calling method to the message text if using to send an email
Automatically captures the calling method via [CallerMemberName]

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Alert.To(System.String,System.String,Lurgle.Alerting.AddressType,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary:
Instantiate a new Alert class using the default from address and specified toAddress. You can chain additional recipients to this.
Uses , and if an email is not specified.
member.param: Email address to send the email to. Comma- and semicolon-delimited lists can be parsed, but toName will then be ignored.
Display name of the recipient. Will be ignored if a comma- or semicolon-delimited toAddress is passed
Type of email address - defaults to but accepts to read from config
Add the calling method to the message text if using to send an email
Automatically captures the calling method via [CallerMemberName]

member.name: T:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig
member.summary: Alerting configuration. Loaded from AppSettings if available but can be configured from code.

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.#ctor
member.summary: AlertConfig constructor
Constructor that permits passing a config and optional overrides of any property

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.AppName
member.summary: Meaningful app name that is used for alerting. Will be auto-set if not specified.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.AppVersion
member.summary: App version will be determined from the binary version, but can be overriden

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailRenderer
member.summary: Set the MailRenderer to use for templates - Razor, Fluid, or Replace

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailSender
member.summary: Set the MailSender to use - SmtpClient or MailKit

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailTemplatePath
member.summary: Set the mail template path. If not specified, will attempt to automatically set to [ExePath]\Templates

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailHost
member.summary: Set the SMTP mail host. Must be specified.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailPort
member.summary: Set the TCP port for SMTP mail - defaults to 25

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailTestTimeout
member.summary: Interval in seconds for the SMTP test to timeout

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailUseAuthentication
member.summary: Set whether the mail host needs authentication

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailUsername
member.summary: Username for mail host authentication

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailPassword
member.summary: Password for mail host authentication

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailUseTls
member.summary: Enable TLS over SMTP - defaults to false

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailTimeout
member.summary: Set the timeout for SMTP sends - defaults to 60 seconds

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailFrom
member.summary: Default From address for emails. Must be set.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailTo
member.summary: Default To address for emails. Must be set.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailDebug
member.summary: Default recipient address to substitute if IsDebug is enabled.

member.name: P:Lurgle.Alerting.AlertConfig.MailSubject
member.summary: Default subject for emails. Defaults to "Alert!"

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Interfaces.IEnvelope.Bcc(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary:
Add an array of email addresses to the BCC field for this alert
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email
member.param: List of email addresses in array form

member.name: M:Lurgle.Alerting.Interfaces.IEnvelope.Bcc(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary:
Add a list of paired email address and name values to the BCC field for the alert
As an optional parameter, this method will not add empty or null addresses to the email
member.param: List of email addresses and display names as a Dictionary of Key = string, Value = string

Optional arguments for string replacement"
